channel.title: CVE Feed for Zoom Communications, Inc -- Zoom Workplace Apps and SDKs

item.title: CVE-2024-39826|2024-08-02T04:26:16.038Z -- zoom%20communications%2C%20inc -- zoom%20workplace%20apps%20and%20sdks
item.description: Path traversal in Team Chat for some Zoom Workplace Apps and SDKs for Windows may allow an authenticated user to conduct information disclosure via network access.
